sentences.sContent: She’s very finicky about what she eats.

synos.tran: 过分讲究的；过分注意的；过分繁琐的

remMethod.val: 单词finical的变体； fin(fine， 精细的) + ical → 精细的 → 过分讲究的

words.tran: 过分注意的；过分讲究的；过分周到的

trans.tranCn: 苛求的， 过分讲究的
trans.tranOther: too concerned with unimportant details and small things that you like or dislike
